post.text: We have a President and somebody running against me that doesn't even want to use the term RADICAL ISLAMIC TERRORISM. If they can't name it, they can't fix it! It is time to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AGAIN!

comment.author: Nathan
comment.text: Zachary Madison Jerome den Dolder trumpiee
